name: Chaimera Artwork Template
summary: Learn about .CHAIT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The CHAIT template is created when you export a template of your artwork designed in the web program and download it onto your device. The CHAIT format is also supported by Adobe InDesign and Fabric JS. Artwork created in Chaimera may also be exported as a .PDF file for printing purposes.
NOTE: Chaimera is an online design tool written in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

description: A CHAIT file is created by Chaimera, a cloud-based page layout and design tool. It contains a template of a page design, which may include text, images, lines, and shapes. CHAIT files are used as a starting point for a new .CHAI document.
